Class WorldObject

  • java.lang.Object
    • WorldObject
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    InteractableObject

    public class WorldObject
extends java.lang.Object
    The WorldObject class is used to represent any special world object for the world (we didn't end up using it that much.)
